Hui Yi denies the allegations. When Wan An showed that Hui Yi's credit card records indicated she bought two pinhole cameras of the exact same model as that found in the landlord's house, everyone in the courtroom was shocked! (PG)婉安在庭上揭露慧怡和死者在18年前就已经认识，死者曾是慧怡的补习老师，当年因慧怡被对方性侵，她怀恨在心，才伺机报复。慧怡一一否认。婉安拿出慧怡的信用卡记录，显示她曾经买了两个针孔摄像机，型号和在房东家找到的一模一样，众人哗然！

Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)福喜与父亲二虎经营餐馆万福楼，当年她婚后丈夫就不告而别，留下女儿亦菲，而差点和福喜结婚的大丰对福喜的突然悔婚愤恨不已。原来福喜的丈夫是天上的灶神，与福喜有一段姻缘，他下凡原本想为福喜和大丰牵红线，谁知糊涂导致福喜怀孕，只好和她结婚。

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 256
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。

programme.title: 祖先保佑2 Blessings 2 - EP 9

Da Xi then asks Chunxian to marry Xue Geng; otherwise, their descendants will disappear. Chunxian is unable to accept the fact. (PG)(重)大喜见春仙对学庚越来越关心，非常欣慰，终于向春仙透露自己的真实身份，说他是春仙未来的曾孙。春仙难以置信。大喜请求春仙一定要跟学庚成亲，否则他们这些子孙后代都会消失。春仙情绪激动，无法接受。

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 3
programme.desc: "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. “星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。

Wan An was moved by Tianliang's actions, and they finally got together. (PG)永诚为死去的妻子复仇，故意驾车撞伤天亮。婉安得知父亲撞伤的人是天亮，感到震惊又歉疚。婉安照顾天亮，对他的为人有更深的了解，渐渐接受他。天亮得知婉安的心意后，对她展开连串攻势。婉安被天亮的傻劲所感动，两人终在一起。

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)得知道英决定要与收购WID集团时装的负责人见面时，武烈便紧张起来，事实是武烈暗中想独吞。他怕东窗事发，便用海珠给的WID集团股份做为抵押向末年借了一大笔钱堵住代表方的嘴。同时，尹雪和道治发现Kelly竟是小春，尹雪也看到她身上的胎记。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) Yunxue took Kelly's toothbrush and did a DNA test and the result reveals a genetic relationship. Yunxue is confused but nary did they know that the toothbrush belongs to Maya. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪拿Kelly的牙刷做亲子鉴定，报告证明Kelly就是尹雪的亲生女儿，尹雪非常高兴。Kelly母亲坚称小春是从正规机构认养的女儿。尹雪再次拿了小春和自己的头发做亲子鉴定，结果却显示尹雪与Kelly不是亲子关系，尹雪困惑了，而她们不知道那是玛亚的牙刷。

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) After an incident on their opening day, the trio became dejected and impolite to their own customers. Meiwei could not take it lying down and gave them a good talking to. When she left in a huff, the trio thought that she was giving up on them and tried all means to make her stay. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The Ganges River assumes many past and present lives. The Hindus believe that the river is flown out of Shiva's hair and it's a sacred place which can wash away sins, cleanse souls and redeem for rebirth. Life is full of sins and atonement and Indians have their own views on life and death. (PG)(重)印度恒河承载着人们的前世今生。兴都徒相信恒河是由湿婆的头发流出来的，它可洗去身上所有罪孽，视之为洗涤灵魂不洁的净身圣地，给思维轮回带来救赎。人生罪恶苦难当，一生一世赎罪忙。印度人的生死观自有一番见解。

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 75

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 31

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 32

Yunxue wants a breakup with Daozi and reveals she is out to take revenge on Zhiyuan. Yunxue found Maya abandoned by Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)在股东大会里，武烈举双手赞成解雇道英为会长，此时金管会的人来调查武烈，武烈趁机逃走。尹雪要和道治分手，还告诉道治她接近他是为了向智媛报仇。尹雪看到玛亚被智媛赶出家，便把她带回自己的家。

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 4
programme.desc: The remote river islands along India's Brahmaputra River in Assam are home to millions - yet basic healthcare is limited. Jojo Goh hops onto the boat clinics to deliver medical care, and to understand how lives are lost as islanders battle yearly flooding and extreme soil erosion, when typhoon strikes. 主持人吴俐璇首次乘船出诊，将医疗服务送到印度阿萨姆邦一条大河上的村庄里。大河将村民隔绝在现代医疗之外，唯有医疗船，能把疫苗接种和紧急接生等服务带给孤立无援的人。雨季大河年年洪涝，医疗船该怎么救死扶伤？

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 28
programme.desc: Priestess A'si will be summoning a black dragon. The Devil King says that the black dragon is especially powerful and suggests that Sanzang allows her body to be taken over by the black dragon to enable Wukong to eliminate it with the Heavenly Sword. Wukong does not approve of the suggestion. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)悟空查到即将被阿斯女召唤的龙是恶毒的黑龙。魔王说黑龙非常强大，就连悟空都可能没办法制服它。魔王建议将三藏的身体当成容器让黑龙附上去，然后由悟空用天剑将黑龙和三藏一起消灭。悟空不答应。

Yunxue wants a breakup with Daozi and reveals she is out to take revenge on Zhiyuan. Yunxue found Maya abandoned by Zhiyuan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在股东大会里，武烈举双手赞成解雇道英为会长，此时金管会的人来调查武烈，武烈趁机逃走。尹雪要和道治分手，还告诉道治她接近他是为了向智媛报仇。尹雪看到玛亚被智媛赶出家，便把她带回自己的家。

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The coveted dream of being a K-pop star has prompted many young hopefuls to leave home for Korea in pursuit of their big break. Beyond the fame and glamour, what sacrifices do they have to make to keep this dream alive? (重)从素人到站上万众瞩目的舞台，韩国的流行神话，促使世界各地许多怀抱明星梦的年轻人，离家出走到韩国，等待一个华丽的转身。为了筑梦，他们付出了多少代价？在光鲜亮丽的外表底下，到底蕴藏了多少汗水、酸楚和无奈呢？

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The topic of this episode is Chinese shaobing, pizza and biscuits from the west. Guo Liang, A Xian and Pornsak discuss about the history and making of different shaobing and pancakes in various regions in China, famous pizza in Italy, French crepes, popiah and pancakes in Singapore and Malaysia. (重)这一集的节目主题是东方烧饼和煎饼和西方的比萨和饼干。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍中国各地区的不同烧饼和煎饼的历史，特色,做法和吃法，意大利的著名比萨，法国独特的可丽饼和新马的薄饼和煎饼 。

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 76
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong is made KP's chairman following a shareholders' meeting. However, his happiness is short-lived when Yinghao suddenly turns up at the meeting. Yinghao produces proof that Xiantai is the real Jin Minxiu. Zaiyong is arrested for his wrongdoings. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)KP召开理事会，全体理事同意载永正式担任会长。就在这时，贤泰带着英鎬入场。英鎬出示贤泰的基因鉴定资料，指贤泰才是真正的金民秀，之前八峰转让给载永的股份是非法的。载永因违反特定经济及其他相关法律被逮捕。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Out late night, Jingxin is attacked by the serial kidnapper, just as the kidnapper raised the pipe for the final blow, Fengshun sent him sprawling with a kick. The kidnapper flees. Jingxin is sent to the hospital with multiple fractures. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)京心夜晚出门遭连环绑架嫌凶袭击，就在凶徒打算挥水管打最后一击的时候，奉顺出现一脚把他踢飞，凶手连滚带爬地逃走了。京心被送进了医院，全身多处骨折。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 33
programme.desc: Zhiyuan goes to Yunxue's house and accuses her kidnapping Maya. She also found the family of the members of the WID Group in her room and shows it to Daozi. Yunxue lures Haizhu to Wulie's hideout and Wulie is captured by Daoying's men. Maya is saddened after her mole is removed by Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛冲进尹雪的家要把玛亚带回家，还指责尹雪绑架了玛亚，也在房里看到了WID集团家庭成员关系表，立刻将其拿给道治看。尹雪安排武烈藏身之地，又引海珠到那，武烈最终被道英抓住。智媛带玛亚把痣点掉，玛亚伤心。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 34
programme.desc: Wulie is released due to lack of evidence. Haizhu tells Wulie that Yunxue is out to take revenge on him. Wulie steals the evidence from Yunxue and plans to regain shares of the WID Group from her. Yunxue discloses to Daozi that his brother intends to sell off the WID fashion business, so Daozi confronts him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈因证据不足被放出来, 海珠跟武烈说尹雪是向他报仇，武烈这时才恍然大悟。武烈决定找尹雪把录音证据销毁，再把WID集团的股份抢回来。尹雪告诉道治，道英要卖掉WID服饰，便跟哥哥对质。

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 12
programme.desc: In Ladakh, there is a group of white-skinned and blue-green eyed people known as the Aryans. Some said they were the descendants of Alexander the Great and German Nazis thought that they were the excellent people in the world. Where did the Aryans come from? Are they Indian, Iranian or German Nazi? 拉达克，住着白皮肤蓝绿眼睛，叫着雅利安的族群，有人说他们是亚历山大大帝的后裔，德国纳粹认为他们是世界上最优秀的民族，到底雅利安人来自哪里？印度人、伊朗人、德国纳粹，都说自己是雅利安人，到底谁是真的？

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 29
programme.desc: Wukong realises that he has fallen for Shanmei for real. He tries to hide his feelings from Shanmei so that she will not feel so sad should he perish in the battle with the black dragon. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)悟空发现自己真的爱上善美，知道若善美察觉他对善美是真爱，那假如悟空在与黑龙抗争时牺牲了，善美将会很难过。悟空于是想将自己对善美的感情隐瞒到底。

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) I Can See Your Voice is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。

programme.title: 开门七件事 Essential 7 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) How did the "Essential 7" as we know and enjoy come to be? Just how are they processed and what revolutionary transformations did they undergo? (重)七件事经过了哪些处理程序，经历了怎样的革命性改变，才成就了今天我们日常生活中所品，所闻，所见的柴米油盐醋茶？

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 77
programme.desc: (R) The Internet is abuzz with news that Zhenshu has abandoned her daughter previously. Zhenshu wants to come clean about her past, but her friends and family advise her against doing so. Reporters hound Xiuqing, causing her to display symptoms of miscarriage. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)网络传出真淑抛弃女儿的消息。真淑不想被大众当成是大骗子，考虑坦白，但身边的家人和朋友都觉得她应该否认到底。事件越闹越大，秀卿也被记者骚扰。秀卿精神紧张，出现流产迹象，须留院。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Guodou is worried about Fengshun's safety as the serial kidnapper has seen Fengshun's face again. Guodou wants Fengshun to hole up in Minhe's house for the time being. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)因为奉顺多次被嫌疑人看到了脸部，所以国斗十分担心，为了奉顺安全要求敏赫让奉顺留宿敏赫家。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 35
programme.desc: Daozi discovers that Daoying and Zhiyuan have instructed the lawyer, Jin, to amend his mother's will. Zhiyuan was at the accident scene after her men knocked Daozi down. Maya witnesses the accident in Daozi's car and she also picks up a brooch that belongs to Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道治发现道英与智媛吩咐金律师修改母亲遗嘱之事。智媛手下将道治撞倒而智媛也在出事现场。玛亚当时在道治车内目睹一却，还捡了智媛的胸针。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 36
programme.desc: Maya hands over Zhiyuan's brooch to Daozi. Zhiyuan denies everything when Daozi confronted her with the brooch. Zhiyuan tries to stop Yunxue from appearing on TV to appeal for information on Xiaochun but to no avail. Wulie is shocked when he saw Maya's photo in the flyer. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)玛亚将智媛的胸针交给道治。智媛看到胸针说不是自己的，对车祸一事全部否认。尹雪跟电视台联系好参加儿童失踪节目，智媛设法阻止。武烈无意中看到末年发的传单，一眼便认出照片上的小孩就是小时候的玛亚。

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 3
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 30
programme.desc: Bajie plots to burn Priestess A'si with a magical lighter, but he himself is trapped in the fire instead. Yulong sacrifices herself to save Bajie. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)八戒带着魔法打火机想把阿斯女给烧了，自己反而着火。玉龙不忍心看八戒受苦，于是紧抱着八戒帮他灭火，牺牲自己。

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) The old lady appears and Aidan questions her! The old lady tells him that Xiao Hong is the most precious thing to him and she is the price he has to pay for all his lies. Aidan is stunned. She also tells Aidan that the same person cannot be saved twice so there is no way Xiao Hong will live... (PG)(重)Aidan责问老太婆，老太婆说出小红就是Aidan生命里最重要的人，小红就是Aidan 撒谎付的代价。Aidan震惊。老太婆也道出一个人不能撒谎救两次，小红是不可能活过来。Aidan悔不当初。。。

programme.desc: (R) In Ladakh, there is a group of white-skinned and blue-green eyed people known as the Aryans. programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 43
programme.desc: (R) Zhengshu goes to the Zhengs' residence to discuss about wedding matters when she assumes that Xiuzi already knows about the relationship between Yuncan and Xizhen. Soon, however, Zhengshu leaves angrily when Xiuzi says she will not accept Yuncan as her son-in-law. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)政淑以为秀子已经知道允灿和熙真在交往的事，特地上门跟秀子谈论两人的婚事。岂料，秀子不赞成两人的关系，还表示绝不会接受吊儿郎当的允灿当她的女婿。政淑气冲冲地离开。

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 44
programme.desc: (R) Zhufeng goes for a check-up when he realizes that his memory is getting from bad to worse. He is diagnosed with early stage dementia. Haixiu is ecstatic when Yuzhen asks her out for a date. Unexpectedly, however, Yuzhen brings her to Junjiu's restaurant and attempts to reconcile Haixiu and her father. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)洙峰发现自己越来越健忘，独自去做检查，证实患上初期失智症。宇真约海秀外出。海秀开心，但宇真竟然把她带到她父亲的炸鸡店，试图让海秀跟俊九和解。海秀遭继母冷嘲热讽一番后转身离开。

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Professional messenger, Healer Xu Zhenghou, meets his tough opponent, an internet entertainment news reporter, Cai Yingxin, who will go all out to get the headlines. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)拥有梦想，有着最尖端实力的职业跑腿人Healer徐正厚在执行新任务的时候遇到了难缠的对手；新闻网站的娱乐记者英信跟徐正厚一样同是一名跑腿记者，她偷偷地跟踪疑似与男人私会的明星，希望能挖掘出大新闻，还扮成快递员上门送货给女明星。

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Jin Wenhao requests Healer Xu Zhenghou to investigate on Cai Yingxin. Zhenghou finds out about Yingxin's past after close surveillance. Zhenghou becomes a murder suspect when a person whom he tailed previously gets killed. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金文浩再一次拜托Healer正厚，让他去调查有关蔡英信的一切。正厚紧密地跟踪被调查者英信，得知英信的过去。曾经被正厚在地铁上跟踪过的人被杀，尸体被发现后，Healer成为了杀人嫌疑犯。

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wei Kunlin and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Qi Wei, Han Xue and Amber Kuo are the guests of the programme. 《最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑第二季》邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力。节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、魏坤琳、鲍橒担任队长，戚薇、韩雪、郭采洁三位女嘉宾倾情加盟。

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 7
programme.desc: Ailin goes for an interview at Zhiyan's shop on Jin Ben's recommendation. Zhiyan hires Ailin as a favour to Jin Ben. Ailin takes the kids and Jin Ben out for meal happily to celebrate her new found job. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)爱麟在金本的推荐下，来到智妍名下的商店参加面试。智妍看在金本的面子上，只好收下了爱麟这个员工。爱麟兴致勃勃地带着孩子们和金本一起出外用餐庆祝自己找到了新工作。

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 8
programme.desc: Zhiyan discovers that she is being tailed. She stays claim and attacks the stalker unexpectedly. She discovers that the stalker is investigating Ailin. Zhiyan suspects there is a mole in NIS investigating Ailin. She rushes to discuss countermeasures with Jin Ben. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智妍察觉有人在跟踪自己。她不动声色，趁其不备袭击了跟踪者。她发觉跟踪者在调查爱麟的底细。智妍怀疑国家情报院里出了奸细在调查爱麟，赶紧和金本商量对策。

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 12
programme.desc: Chairman Nan Rihao and his son Guiwan visit the prosecutor's office and request Cai Zhenjing to be prosecutor for the retrial. As the date of the retrial neared, Wuxi deliberately arranges for Renya to be the prosecutor of the retrial instead. This puts Renya in a difficult position... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)南日浩会长和儿子圭万亲自去了检察局，请蔡真景检察官为这次的复审辩护。重审的日期日渐逼近，武锡故意安排仁雅成为重审案的检察官，一时间让仁雅的处境陷入两难。。。。。。

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. (重)由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Behind each of the stalwarts of the Singaporean Food Empire is a man or woman who has dedicated years to the craft. In this episode of Food Empire, we take a closer look at the masters behind the creation of a national icon, a Cantonese classic and a hawker darling

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak & Cui Fang are in Japan, Taiwan & Malaysia respectively to explore the development of instant noodles, the secret behind the taste of pineapples and tasting of pineapple tarts, search for the century-old handmade vermicelli and learn about cultivation and processing of durians. (重)在第一集的《食材地图》节目中，Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往日本、台湾和马来西亚，一探快熟面的发展，发掘凤梨的美味奥秘，品尝台湾凤梨酥的酸甜滋味，寻找传承百年的手工米粉，了解万果之王榴梿的种植与加工。

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The remote river islands along India's Brahmaputra River in Assam are home to millions - yet basic healthcare is limited. Jojo Goh hops onto the boat clinics to deliver medical care, and to understand how lives are lost as islanders battle yearly flooding and extreme soil erosion, when typhoon strikes. (重)主持人吴俐璇首次乘船出诊，将医疗服务送到印度阿萨姆邦一条大河上的村庄里。大河将村民隔绝在现代医疗之外，唯有医疗船，能把疫苗接种和紧急接生等服务带给孤立无援的人。雨季大河年年洪涝，医疗船该怎么救死扶伤？

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 45
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan tells Xiuzi that Haixiu is hankering after Yuzhen's affection and urges Xiuzi to chase Haixiu and her family out of her house. Xiuzi is disgusted with Yiyuan's behaviour and gives her a good scolding. Haocai and Ailan are over the moon when they find out that Ailan is pregnant. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)艺苑告诉秀子海秀是因为喜欢宇真才故意搬到她家，要秀子把海秀和她问题多多的家人们赶走。秀子觉得艺苑心胸狭窄，伤害善良的海秀和孩子们，骂了艺苑一顿。爱兰持续几天不舒服，担心得了绝症，深夜到宇真的医院看诊才发现自己怀孕了。

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 46
programme.desc: (R) Yiyuan's father wants her to be responsible for the complaints about the canteen food. Yiyuan assumes that Haixiu has incited the hospital staff to lodge the complaints. She thus decides to terminate Junjiu's contract and also ban Haixiu from entering the canteen to take revenge against Haixiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)医院的员工开始厌倦ONE's食品的料理，艺苑的父亲要艺苑想出对策。艺苑认为是海秀煽动医院职员投诉ONE's食品的，于是扬言要终止俊九的炸鸡店的合约，并且要海秀的上司禁止她进出餐厅以作为报复。

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Zhenghou sneaks into Yingxin's room to look for confidential materials. He is shocked to find Jin Wenhao's photographs on the wall of Yingxin's room. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正厚被警方列为杀人嫌疑犯，他的搭档于是警告正厚及早收手，不要继续调查英信，但正厚却发现英信身边有趣的现象。正厚悄悄潜入英信的房间里寻找一些机密资料，却惊愕地发现在房间墙壁上贴着一些相片，其中居然有委托正厚调查英信的金文浩和他被偷拍的独照。

programme.title: 治愈者 Healer - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Zhenghou discovers that Wenhao is also monitoring Yingxin. He decides to work as Yingxin's assistant, with the motive to unearth the secret between Wenhao and Yingxin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)正厚为了捉到诬陷自己的凶手而密切地监视着英信，却发现了另一个也在背后监视着英信的人-文浩。正厚决定伪装成新人，到英信工作的新闻网站当她的助理，查探她和金文浩之间到底有什么惊人的秘密。

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 1
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. First, the celebrity pop singers featured in that episode (there are usually three total) are shown singing one of their well-known songs in the studio. Fans are shown singing along simultaneously in UGC clips showing people singing into their computers or mobile phones from wherever they are. Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. (首播)《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 9
programme.desc: Rongtai sends someone to investigate Jin Ben's background and shows it the report to Ailin. Ailin mistakes Jin Ben as a thief and feels disappointed on with him. Ailin panics when she finds out that Jin Ben and Zhiyan know each other. She has no idea about the real identity of the mysterious Jin Ben. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)容泰派人调查了金本的履历，然后拿给爱麟看。爱麟误以为金本是个小偷，对他大失所望。爱麟还发现金本与智妍是认识的，让她更加恐慌，不知神秘的金本到底是何方神圣。

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 10
programme.desc: Zhiyan learns from her superior that it is Quan Yinshi who has touched Ailin's investigation report. Everybody starts to be wary of Quan Yingshi. Ailin asks Jin Ben out and informs him he no longer needs to babysit Junxi and Junxiu anymore. Jin Ben feels a sense of loss. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智妍从上司口中得知是权英实移动了高爱麟的调查报告。大家对权英实开始起了提防之心。爱麟约金本见面，告诉他以后不必再做俊熙和俊秀的保姆了，金本心里不免感到失落。

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Renya refuses to collude with prosecutor general Wuxi to frame Zhenyu. Wuxi transfers Renya to a rural district prosecution office because of this. Renya resigns in anger and goes to work in Zhenyu's law firm. Zaihe dies from illness in the middle of the retrial. Zhenyu is extremely sad and blames himself for not being able to vindicate his father. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仁雅不愿与检察官总长武锡同流合污陷害振宇，因此遭到武锡的排挤，还被调往乡下地方检察院。她一怒之下辞职到振宇的事务所帮忙。载赫在重审期间因病情加重不幸身亡。振宇痛苦万分，自责没能还父亲清白。

programme.title: 新语研究所 Fun With SINGnese - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Fun with SINGnese is an infotainment series that explores the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words and how they have been passed down till now. Hosted by Pornsak, Ben Yeo and Desmond Ng, this episode discusses how the terms Coolie, Lui (money), Towkay and Waterloo Street came about. (重)《新语研究所》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，主持人Pornsak，杨志龙，黄振隆和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。这一集谈的词汇包括苦力，镭，头家和四马路，带你一起发掘这些新语的来源。

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) Recently, there are many women who are becoming rather violent! Does it mean they are more aware of protecting themselves? Why is it that nowadays more men are kneeling down to women to seek forgiveness? Let our guests tell you how to maintain a good relationship without resorting to violence! (重)最近新加坡出现了许多"文武双全"的时代女性！她们的暴力行为是否因为更懂得保护自己？行为和语言上的暴力是女人的专利？现代男人为何更容易对女人下跪？男人女人就不能相敬如宾吗？让众嘉宾为你分析和探讨！

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 78
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu reveals her relationship with Xiuqing at a press conference. Xianying shows up uninvited and accuses Zhenshu of putting on a false front and trying to gain sympathy. Zhenshu is attacked more venomously by the public after the press conference. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑召开记者会说出跟秀卿的关系。记者会本来顺利地进行，但仙英突然出现，指真淑道歉是为了想博取同情心，不是出于真心。真淑坦白后，不但得不到民众的谅解，反而迎来更严厉的批评。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) The rumours of Minhe's sexual inclination affected the shares of the Five Star Group and had a negative impact on Minhe. Minhe takes Fengshun home, and informs his father and his three brothers that Fengshun is his girlfriend and he wants to marry Fengshun. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)传言敏赫是同性恋的消息影响到五星集团的股票，敏赫带奉顺回家，告知大家奉顺是自己的女朋友，并且要与奉顺结婚。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 37
programme.desc: Wulie discloses to Zhiyuan that Yunxue is actually Ruli. Daoying figures out that Zhiyuan is the culprit for all the conflicts, so he wants to divorce her. Daoying is unconscious after a scuffle with Zhiyuan and the incident is recorded by a hidden pin camera by Yunxue. She uses the video to threaten Zhiyuan if she reports her to the police. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈透露给智媛尹雪其实是如莉。道英分析后，断定所有发生的事是智媛指示的，便提出要跟她离婚。两人在拉扯中智媛把道英撞倒,昏迷过去。事发过程被尹雪的摄像机拍下。尹雪便拿视频威胁智媛，如果举报她，她会把视频公开。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 38
programme.desc: Yunxue reveals to Daozhi the reasons Zhiyuan adopted her when her father passed away. Daozhi collaborates with Yunxue to chase Zhiyuan out of WID Group. They plan to get married. Zhiyuan becomes the CEO for WID Group and she fires Yunxue immediately. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)尹雪告诉道治智媛父亲过世后领养她的目的。两个打算合作摧毁智媛并跟其结婚。智媛终于如愿当上了WID集团的董事长, 上任后就将尹雪开除。

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 7
programme.desc: Nadia and Aidan starts dating. Jenny jumps ship to another company and Ming Lie introduces a new colleague who turns out to be Mei Qi. Aidan is shocked to see that Mei Qi looks exactly like Eva and is certain that Eva is faking Mei Qi's identity. Nadia insists that Mei Qi is her long lost sister. Aidan is worried that Nadia will get scammed; he tries to prove that Mei Qi is actually Eva and ends up arguing with Nadia. (PG)Nadia和Aidan开始交往。珍妮跳槽别的公司，明烈介绍新同事，竟是美琪！Aidan惊见美琪与伊娃一样长相，认定是伊娃冒认美琪！但Nadia却说美琪就是自己失散的亲妹妹。Aidan担心Nadia被骗，想证明美琪是伊娃，却一再与Nadia发生口角。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 31
programme.desc: Shanmei succumbs to serious injuries in the battle with the black dragon and Wukong loses his memory.
